thread.title: BRIEF-Mgm China Holdings Now Expects Public Opening Date Of Mgm Cotai Within Month Of Feb 2018

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mgm China Holdings Now Expects Public Opening Date Of Mgm Cotai Within Month Of Feb 2018

organizations.name: brief-mgm china holdings now expects public opening date of mgm cotai

text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Mgm China Holdings Ltd:
* NOW EXPECTED PUBLIC OPENING DATE OF MGM COTAI WILL BE WITHIN MONTH OF FEBRUARY 2018
* ‍OVERALL BUDGET OF MGM COTAI EXPECTED TO REMAIN UNCHANGED AT APPROXIMATELY HK$27 BILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
